doc.field: U.K. MONEY MARKET GIVEN FURTHER 485 MLN STG HELP

The Bank of England said it had given the money market a further 485 mln stg assistance in the afternoon session. This takes the Bank's total help so far today to 582 mln stg and compares with its forecast of a 750 mln stg shortage in the system today. The central bank bought bank bills outright comprising 345 mln stg in band one at 9-7/8 pct and 75 mln stg in band two at 9-3/16 pct. It also purchased 65 mln stg of treasury bills in band one at 9-7/8 pct. REUTER
